AuthorDetails.Name: Andy Boot
AuthorDetails.Description: Andy is a senior web developer with over 10 years of .Net development experience focusing mainly on CMS platforms such as Umbraco & Kentico.

Description: Indexy allows a developer to effortlessly create custom Examine indexes within Umbraco by simply adding a few options to the website appsettings.json file.

Screenshots.Caption: Basic example of how to create a custom index named BlogIndex with only authorName & articleDate of the article document type.
Custom index is automatically added to the Examine Management section of the backoffice.

Title: Our.Umbraco.Indexy
